newsitem.title: USA: Indus Group buys stake in TenFold.
newsitem.headline: Indus Group buys stake in TenFold.

text.p: The Indus Group said it acquired a 10 percent stake in TenFold Corp, a software development firm based in Salt Lake City, Utah.

Indus did not disclose financial terms of the agreement, but said that with its investment it obtains a "perpetual and unrestricted license" to use the TenFold Architecture. In addition, Indus President and Chief Executive Officer Robert Felton gains a seat on the TenFold board of directors.
